title: Iustitiae Divinae Vestigia In Vindicando Crimine Laesae Maiestatis Consectatus
creator: Taust, Johannes Gottofredus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Taust, Johannes Gottofredus: Iustitiae Divinae Vestigia In Vindicando Crimine Laesae Maiestatis Consectatus  Ad Solennia Natalis CCVII Gymnasii Hallensis Die 28 Augusti Anni P. C. N. MDCCLXXII ... In Scena Oratoria Nonnulis Civium Declamationibus Atque Dialogis Celebranda Amplissimos Gymnasii Patronos Ephorosque Nec Non Gravissimos Quosque Rei Sacrae Civilisque Proceres Generososque Litterarum Humaniorum Fautores Precibus Humanissimis Convocat Johannes Gottofredus Taust Gymnasii Rector. Hallae Magdeburgicae  Berlin 1772
